author: Rosie
install_msg:
Thanks for installing AdminToggle! For info on this cog, use `,help CogName`! 
If you want to help translate, go to my [crowdin](https://crowdin.com/project/Star-Cogs)
If you like my work, [donate me!](https://ko-fi.com/starcogs) 

Toggle admin on/off (used to hide channels etc) by automatically adding/removing a configured role!
description: Do you need to hide channels from admins for game purposes? This cog allows an admin to toggle off his admin permissions and toggle it back on.
name: Admintoggle
